messages.content:
Hey,
Tony Das, one of India's best guitar players, who plays for some the biggest bands around, Peepal Tree and Bhoomi, is conducting a workshop on 'Guitar Patches & Tone Creation' on the 26th of November. 

The workshop covers various topics on effects, delays, reverb, flangers, phasers, how to get the best sound out of your guitar, miking and more.

Block your seat today! 
Fees : Rs 750
Contact us: 9535193436 / 7760456847

https://www.facebook.com/events/109223212756128
